abstract: Former Khmer Rouge member Ao An is charged with crimes against humanity by international judge in Cambodia.
lead_paragraph: An international judge at a war crimes court in Cambodia charged another former Khmer Rouge member with crimes against humanity on Friday.

headline.main: Cambodia: Another Khmer Rouge Member Is Charged
headline.print_headline: Asia; Cambodia: Another Khmer Rouge Member Is Charged

snippet: An international judge at a war crimes court in Cambodia charged another former Khmer Rouge member with crimes against humanity on Friday.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
